about_the_game:
YOU ARE THE SUPER MEGA LEGEND PHOENIX





You’re the legendary Phoenix, the famous hero of a massive battle that happened 2,000 years ago. You took a super long nap to heal your battle wounds, but now, monsters from the land are coming to find and defeat you!



As a proud mythical creature, you can’t back down from a challenge, but there’s a catch—you can only use your full, super awesome power for just 11 seconds because you’re still healing.

Get ready to take down wave after wave of enemies and show them that the legend of the “Super Mega Legend Phoenix” is still alive!


How to Play





Playing is super easy!
But winning won’t be easy!





When the game starts, the keys you need to press will show up on the right side of the screen. Press the right keys to attack the monsters.

Watch out for COMBOS! Every time you press the correct key, your COMBO goes up by 1, and your attack power increases too! (+1 for each COMBO) But if you press the wrong key, your COMBO goes back to 0.



You’ve only got 11 seconds to fight! If you don’t defeat all the enemies (LEVEL 10) in 11 seconds, you lose.



But if you manage to take down all 10 levels of enemies in time, you win!


And remember, YOU ARE THE SUPER MEGA LEGEND PHOENIX

YOU ARE THE SUPER MEGA LEGEND PHOENIX





You’re the legendary Phoenix, the famous hero of a massive battle that happened 2,000 years ago. You took a super long nap to heal your battle wounds, but now, monsters from the land are coming to find and defeat you!



As a proud mythical creature, you can’t back down from a challenge, but there’s a catch—you can only use your full, super awesome power for just 11 seconds because you’re still healing.

Get ready to take down wave after wave of enemies and show them that the legend of the “Super Mega Legend Phoenix” is still alive!


How to Play





Playing is super easy!
But winning won’t be easy!





When the game starts, the keys you need to press will show up on the right side of the screen. Press the right keys to attack the monsters.

Watch out for COMBOS! Every time you press the correct key, your COMBO goes up by 1, and your attack power increases too! (+1 for each COMBO) But if you press the wrong key, your COMBO goes back to 0.



You’ve only got 11 seconds to fight! If you don’t defeat all the enemies (LEVEL 10) in 11 seconds, you lose.



But if you manage to take down all 10 levels of enemies in time, you win!


And remember, YOU ARE THE SUPER MEGA LEGEND PHOENIX

YOU ARE SUPER MEGA LEGENDARY PHEONIX - LOOSE

name: YOU ARE SUPER MEGA LEGEND PHOENIX

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel i5 5500 / AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Proximity Chat Req 10Mbps Up/Down
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel i5 10500 / AMD Ryzen 7+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Proximity Chat Req 10Mbps Up/Down

short_description: YOU ARE THE SUPER MEGA LEGEND PHOENIX is a quick 11-second game you play with your keyboard. Attack and defeat the incoming enemies by pressing the highlighted keys. Defeat all 10 levels of enemies to win!
